Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Tell Dafana, Probably south-eastern part of the Saite enclosure (so-called "Camp")
Curator's comments: On the large amount of iron slag found, particularly "all over the S.E. of the camp", see W.M.F. Petrie, Tanis ii, Nebesheh and Defenneh, p. 59 § 57, 79 § 78. See also London, BM, EA 23990 and Boston, MFA RES 87.84.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1888 / Tanis. Part II. Nebesheh (Am) and Defenneh (Tahpanhes) (p. 59 § 57, 79 § 78)
Leclère and Spencer 2014 / Tell Dafana Reconsidered: The Archaeology of an Egyptian Frontier Town (p.47, p.89, p.188, pl.30)
